headline.main: NAPLES SHATTERED BY BOTH ARMIES; Our Aerial Bombs and German Demolitions Caused Great Damage to Harbor MUNITIONS SHIP BLOWN UP Berlin Reveals Loss of Vessel, Set Afire During Raid by American Planes

lead_paragraph: ALGIERS, Oct. 1 (AP) -- For months, Naples was blasted by Allied planes, especially Flying Fortresses.
abstract: Allied bombs and Ger demolitions cause harbor damage
snippet: ALGIERS, Oct. 1 (AP) -- For months, Naples was blasted by Allied planes, especially Flying Fortresses....
